articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Brexit sovereignty plan set out in Great Repeal Bill
articles.description: Measures to end the supremacy of EU law come after the government formally triggered Brexit.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Missing helicopter: Police launch Snowdonia ground search
articles.description: Five people are still missing after a helicopter vanished off the radar while over north Wales.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Insurer Lloyd's of London confirms new Brussels subsidiary
articles.description: The 329-year-old insurance market says it has chosen Brussels for its new EU subsidiary.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Oscars will still use accountant firm PwC despite envelopegate blunder
articles.description: The firm that handles balloting is being retained, but its staff will be banned from using mobiles.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Lord Heseltine: Brexit Britain relinquishes power
articles.description: Tory peer and Remain campaigner Lord Heseltine says Britain has no leverage for Brexit negotiations.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Syria: Living with war
articles.description: BBC special coverage of a day in Syria where war may be simmering but is far from over.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump travel ban: Hawaii judge places indefinite hold
articles.description: The ruling means the president cannot enforce the ban while it is contested in court.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Glastonbury reveals 88 more acts, including Katy Perry and Stormzy
articles.description: Ed Sheeran and Radiohead will be joined by Stormzy, Royal Blood and Katy Perry, amongst others.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Cut sugar in cakes, chocolate by 20%, industry told
articles.description: The guidelines for everyday foods are aimed at helping to reduce childhood obesity.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: SpaceX set to launch 'used rocket'
articles.description: California's SpaceX company expects to make a piece of history later when it re-flies a Falcon rocket.
